app_descript:
Late Midnight Shift Horror

Brief:
Dive into a spine-chilling experience with Late Midnight Shift Horror, where a seemingly normal night at work spirals into an unimaginable nightmare. As you navigate through routine tasks and attend to customers, you soon discover that all is not as it seems. Gear up for unexpected twists and terrifying encounters that will keep you on the edge of your seat.
